Row.Text: R'lyeh is named for the underwater kingdom from which Cthulhu once ruled the planet. Now, the stars are right and Cthulhu has returned to claim what is rightfully his.

Cthulhu is a Great Old One. Once, long ago, before the damn of Humanity, Cthulhu and his minions ruled the Earth, warring with the Elder Gods. Eventually, a great cataclysm destroyed his cities and buried his kingdom of R'lyeh beneath the waves, driving Cthulhu into a death-like slumber. After waiting untold eons, the stars are right for Cthulhu to reemerge, using his human followers to reclaim what is rightfully his.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cthulhu is a being of vaguely anthropoid outline, but with an octopus-like head whose face was a mass of feelers, a scaly, rubbery-looking body, prodigious claws on hind and fore feet, and long, narrow wings behind.
